The sections below describe the R code and data files needed to reproduce the results presented in the Mozer et al. (2019) article entitled *\"Matching with Text Data: An Experimental Evaluation of Methods for Matching Documents and of Measuring Match Quality*\", forthcoming at *Political Analysis*. 

## Dependencies

For the replication, you will need the following packages:

- tm
- quanteda 
- stringr
- cobalt
- optmatch
- dplyr
